targets.expr:
topk(5,(sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m]))))

avg by () (sum by (node_name) ( avg by (mode,node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",
node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[$interval]),1)) or 
(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="steal",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) ) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or 
avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[5m])))

sum by (node_name) ((clamp_max(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait",mode!="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or

node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or

avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="steal"}[5m]))))

node_type=~"$node_type",mode="steal"}[$interval]),1)) or

(clamp_max(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type",mode!="idle",mode!="iowait"}[5m]),1)) )*100 or 
(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or

(avg_over_time(node_cpu_average{node_name=~"$host",region=~"$region",node_type=~"$node_type", mode="total"}[$interval]) or

panels.description: Shows how much disk was loaded for reads or writes as average number of outstanding requests at different period of time.  High disk load is a good measure of actual storage utilization. Different storage types handle load differently - some will show latency increases on low loads others can handle higher load with no problems.

targets.expr:
avg by() (sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]))))

panels.title: Top 5 Disk I/O Load

targets.expr:
sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) + 
sum by (node_name) (rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]))

panels.description: Shows average latency for Reads and Writes IO Devices.  Higher than typical latency for highly loaded storage indicates saturation (overload) and is frequent cause of performance problems.  Higher than normal latency also can indicate internal storage problems.

targets.expr:
topk(5,(
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])/1000))
))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) or
((avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_write_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])/1000) + 
(avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])/1000 or 
avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])/1000)))

panels.title: Top 5 Disk Latency

targets.expr:

rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0  or 
(rate(node_disk_write_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_writes_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) +
sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) / 
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > 0 or 
(rate(node_disk_read_time_seconds_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) /
rate(node_disk_reads_completed_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) > bool 0) or

avg_over_time(aws_rds_read_latency_average{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])/1000))

topk(5,(sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) +
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])))
))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or

(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or

)

(sum by (node_name) ((rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_read_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_readThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) +
rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or 
irate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]) or
(rate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval]) or
irate(rdsosmetrics_diskIO_writeThroughput{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])))
)

topk(5,(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])))
))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) +

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]))))

(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])) + 
(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m]))))

panels.description: Total Number of Local Network Interface Transmit Errors, Receive Errors and Drops.  Should be  Zero

targets.expr:
topk(5,(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval]) + rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m]) + irate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m]))))

avg by() (sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval]) + rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (irate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m]) + irate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[5m])))

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_rx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or

sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[$interval])) or 
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(rdsosmetrics_network_tx{node_name=~"$host"}[5m])))

(sum by (node_name) (rate(node_network_receive_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval]) + rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total{node_name=~"$host", device!="lo"}[$interval])) or
